titleStmt.title: Restoration of gʷǝlt by ‘Amda Ṣǝyon/Garba Masqal
CCR 22

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

abstract.p: This document, number twenty two in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 22 according to Bausi's reference). The document is attested twice, in its older version the donation was reattributed to King Gabra Masqal via erasion of a previous name. Further, this document was apparently copied, into a small quire, which contains a number of documents likely copied from older documents (originals?) in the sixteenth century. Zt this stage one can not say whether the later version of the document represents the original version of the document before its correction or whether it is a third interpretation of this donation.
